summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5631 for the improvement of 34th Avenue North, from the south line of Coulter's Addition to East Thomas Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 74315, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
